attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am opening this petition as I find it extrememly unfair that as a 19 year old male, I am only entitled to £4.45 an hour.

I work and live in London. I am struggling to lead a healthy life on the amount of money I am paid each week.

I like anybody else pay council tax, rent, need to buy clothes/food. Yet because I am under the age of 22 I am expected to live my life on breadline.

I don't receive any special discounts, all my bills, clothes, food and needs are the same. Surely this is a case of age discrimination.

I would be extremely grateful if you people out there can help us "YOUNG ADULTS" by backing this petition to have the minimum age for the ages 18-21 to be matched with 22 years plus.

Many Thanks

Stephen Walters

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
